title: Apple Mac Mini drops to all-time low price at Amazon this weekend
author: tabitha-baker
summary: Extra discounts make for big price drops
article: It's not every day that you see Apple Mac Mini deals dropping to brand new price lows at Amazon, but right now, an extra $69 discount at Amazon is offering just that.

You'll find the M1-equipped 2020 Mac Mini on sale for just $599.99 right now (was $699) - the first time the desktop Mac has dropped down to such a low price. Not only are you getting that blindingly fast processor, but with 8GB RAM and a 256GB SSD under the hood, this entry-level model is offering particularly good value this week.

This extra Mac Mini deal comes on top of the $30 discount shared across a number of retailers over the course of the month, leaving us with a full $100 saving overall. That means there's never been a better time to grab a pocket-sized Apple computer.
